page.title: 01 INTRODUCTION
page.content: Our area that we are doing is mainly country side. But some of our area which is called{Askern}is covered in shops and houses. The country side which we are doing is covered in a mixture of crops, grassland of some kind, houses and farms. If you go back into{Askern}you can see a big difference. Litter is all over the ground and the fumes and smoke coming from the{pit}makes it worse. Most houses in{Askern}are grey and dull with dirt: this is caused by the{ {mining}and {coalite}industry. Out in the country side the houses stand on their own or with farm buildings. On a normal shopping day the market place in{Askern}is usually busy with rushing people trying to get their shopping done. About half of the buildings in the country side are farm buildings.
